name: Everything was Beautiful and Nothing Hurt V2

metadata.name: The World, The Peace
metadata.description:
/ word in the artwork is translated from Russian as «world» or «peace» /

Performative installation fixed on video.
Wood, nails, fire. Physical object is made manually, 2022.

— «The World, The Peace» is devoted to the absurdity of wars in the context of Russia's military actions in Ukraine.
It’is my personal experience of loss and collective pain. It shows broken system where wars are made for the sake of peace and human life is not valued.
